function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Participants providing professional care for COVID-19 patients","Impact":"Potential exposure to COVID-19 and increased risk of contracting the disease","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control measures, provide adequate PPE, and conduct regular testing","Technologies":"PPE, testing kits, and telemedicine solutions","People":"Participants providing professional care for COVID-19 patients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Visiting friends or family over the age of 75 on a regular basis","Impact":"Increased risk of transmitting COVID-19 to vulnerable individuals","Mitigation":"Encourage virtual visits, use personal protective equipment, and practice strict hygiene measures","Technologies":"Video calling platforms and telehealth solutions","People":"Individuals visiting friends or family over the age of 75","Owner":"Community organizations, local public health departments"},{"Description":"Survey participation excluding individuals who failed the attention check","Impact":"Potential bias in the survey results due to exclusion of certain individuals","Mitigation":"Conduct additional sensitivity analysis, explore alternative methods of data validation, and include a detailed discussion of potential biases","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software and data validation tools","People":"Researchers and survey administrators","Owner":"Research institutions and survey organizations"}]}
